data.eml:eml: On some species of the genus Acrolocha Thomson, 1858 of the Western Palaearctic Region (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Omaliini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V., Khachikov, Eduard A. (2019): On some species of the genus Acrolocha Thomson, 1858 of the Western Palaearctic Region (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Omaliini). Zootaxa 4576 (2): 347-356, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4576.2.8
